long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuantumMail uses the power of Ivy.ai and OpenAI's GPT on your GMail or Outlook.com email accounts. Need to write an email? Just tell your chatbot what to compose! Your chatbot can also compose draft replies to help you take control of your overflowing inbox!  

QuantumMail optimizes your team's ability to accurately and efficiently respond to emails by providing AI-generated responses derived directly from your bot's QuantumBrain.  When using QuantumMail you are able to send out immediate replies to the end-user confirming their email was received as well as compose bot-drafted emails using Ivy's proprietary AI.  

QuantumMail is available for use within a centralized group or individual inbox.
